data.what_is:
Retention Science is the best way to target, engage and retain your customers. Our data-driven, SaaS-based Retention Marketing platform predicts customer behavior and delivers targeted multi-channel communications that increase revenue and encourage customer advocacy. We make sophisticated data science and marketing automation simple and accessible for marketing teams of all sizes.

Retention Science, a Constant Contact company, is a provider of ecommerce-focused digital marketing services powered by intelligent technology and customer support to help sell more in less time. Our data-driven platform sends the right messages to the right customers at the right time and delivers personalized, multi-channel communications that help drive big results. Learn more at retentionscience.com.
data.product_description: Retention Sciences data-driven platform predicts customer behavior to deliver targeted communications.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: As reported in 15 Retention Science reviews. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications. This feature was mentioned in 15 Retention Science reviews.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product. 14 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements This feature was mentioned in 15 Retention Science reviews.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: As reported in 16 Retention Science reviews. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 16 Retention Science reviews. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 18 Retention Science reviews. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending. 18 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring. 18 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores This feature was mentioned in 16 Retention Science reviews.

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 15 Retention Science reviews. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects. 17 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion. This feature was mentioned in 18 Retention Science reviews.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages. 16 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 15 Retention Science reviews. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database. 16 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information. 18 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: As reported in 15 Retention Science reviews. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps. 17 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks. 16 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: As reported in 15 Retention Science reviews. Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time This feature was mentioned in 16 Retention Science reviews.

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 17 Retention Science reviews. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity. 15 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward. 16 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: As reported in 16 Retention Science reviews. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: Data Enrichment
features.content: Uses external data sources to improve customer profiles. This feature was mentioned in 14 Retention Science reviews.

features.name: Expandability
features.content: Based on 14 Retention Science reviews. Can be updated to accept new sources and types of data.

features.name: Content Marketing
features.content: As reported in 15 Retention Science reviews. Can act as a content marketing platform.

features.name: Multiple Devices
features.content: Based on 14 Retention Science reviews. Can engage with customers across any device with a consistent message.

features.name: Marketing Metrics
features.content: As reported in 14 Retention Science reviews. Provides analysis of marketing program ROI and efficiency.

features.name: Predictive Modeling
features.content: Predicts outcomes based on statistical models; can give insight to "what-if" scenarios. 14 reviewers of Retention Science have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Recommendation Engine
features.content: Uses artificial intelligence to provide suggestions based on desired outcomes. This feature was mentioned in 14 Retention Science reviews.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent email automation platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Retention Science?
Using Retention Science has really helped us make a major shift in how we approach email marketing by focusing on customer lifecycle as opposed to just marketing towards a path to purchase. The automated email platform has been extremely helpful for us in understanding the path to purchase and focusing on providing better value to our customers by using multiple strategies at different stages of the customer lifecycle.

What do you dislike about Retention Science?
Integrations are limited for the purpose of orchestrating marketing campaigns across platforms using different tools. I'd like the ability to integrate with our SMS vendor to send emails or SMS messages at different stages or triggers. Not having the ability to add custom fields is also a pretty hard pill to swallow after coming from Drip where we could add almost any data to customer profiles.

What problems is Retention Science solving and how is that benefiting you?
Improving email marketing conversion rate and number of sends by keeping customers in an automated email cycle. Improving our customer nurture processes and giving us better results when customers are indicating that they're ready to buy.

What do you dislike about Retention Science?
Analytics aren't very helpful, you need to pull multiple reports to get the information you need. The lag between conversions and what appears in analytics is too long. Creating audience segments is way too clunky and not intuitive. The stages are helpful as pre-made drip journeys, but the flipside is there is no insight into what is happening within the stages. Our rep was initially helpful but we never hear from them unless we reach out.

Email communication with our customers is more automated than on other platforms, great for when our team was one person with too much on their plate.

initial_reviews.review_title: Innovative and Helpful
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Retention Science?
We've been working with Retention Science for about 2 years now, after Mailchimp and Klaviyo. We vastly prefer Retention Science. Our account manager relationship has been extremely helpful for our small team and through that relationship we have also been able to gain access to new features while they are still in beta mode. It has been great to partner with RS to test new innovations like more detailed segmentation and more personalized automation flows.

What do you dislike about Retention Science?
We have had some account manager turnover - but just having a real account manager who can show the detailed analytics and trends and provide thoughtful recommendations is so far above the offerings from competitors that I wouldn't necessarily even call this a "dislike."

What problems is Retention Science solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have been most interested in the ability to segment different customer groups, which Retention Science provides in many different ways, through their core automated flows and the more advanced Paths feature. Segmenting in this way has increased our conversion rate and our engagement rates. Even our open rates have gone up as we are only sending customers the content that they need. The help the RS team has provided in strategy has saved our small team countless hours as well.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent Customer Service, Real People
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Retention Science?
Retention Science has been a great partner to me because they not only listen and understand my business' needs, but they have also gone out of their way to keep my business during a time when balls were dropped.  Our brand is not big by any means (yet), and most agencies/services like ReSci would have said sorry and moved on, but Jerry and his team worked with me, and have been a part of our biggest year yet.  The customer support I receive from Mayra is fantastic, and the direct line I have to Jerry Jao makes me feel valued.    I feel like ReSci has my company's best interest in mind, and it makes the relationship collaborative, enjoyable, and most importantly profitable for both sides.

What do you dislike about Retention Science?
It hasn't been a perfect fit due to the size of my company, and ReSci's model and core value prop.  Because Retention Science is able to work its magic best with a larger company (larger customer base/emails to leverage the AI services, more consistent/healthier cash flow/inventory position).  There have been times, to no fault of Retention Science's, where we did not have enough inventory (read: no inventory) to generate any sales, let alone send out compelling emails.  As a very small, self-funded company, it has been challenging to meet demand and scale at the ideal rate.  During these out of stock times, it hurts to pay an enterprise-level fee to use ReSci's platform with a start-up-level wallet size.   The large majority of companies at our size would a service that has a lower monthly fee, and less hands-on service based on their budget, but we took a leap of faith joining ReSci because we knew what we could grow into, and their leadership so the same vision as us.  It's amazing that we're starting to grow to a size that allows ReSci's value prop and pricing make sense based on the revenues we bring in.

What problems is Retention Science solving and how is that benefiting you?
Retention Science is helping us accomplish our main objective of getting every single person who wants a pair a of Swoveralls...a pair of Swoveralls!  The email flows and audience insights up to this point have been incredibly helpful, but not necessarily differentiating from what a competitor service could provide.  What separates Retention Science apart from any other eCRM partner is the 1-on-1 customer support I receive from Mayra.  Mayra has an intimate understanding of ReSci and our business, and holds us accountable to implementing her actionable recommendations.  With her help, we are ultimately solving the problem of missed sales. Due to lack of communication on our end.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent email automation platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Retention Science?
Using Retention Science has really helped us make a major shift in how we approach email marketing by focusing on customer lifecycle as opposed to just marketing towards a path to purchase. The automated email platform has been extremely helpful for us in understanding the path to purchase and focusing on providing better value to our customers by using multiple strategies at different stages of the customer lifecycle.

What do you dislike about Retention Science?
Integrations are limited for the purpose of orchestrating marketing campaigns across platforms using different tools. I'd like the ability to integrate with our SMS vendor to send emails or SMS messages at different stages or triggers. Not having the ability to add custom fields is also a pretty hard pill to swallow after coming from Drip where we could add almost any data to customer profiles.

What problems is Retention Science solving and how is that benefiting you?
Improving email marketing conversion rate and number of sends by keeping customers in an automated email cycle. Improving our customer nurture processes and giving us better results when customers are indicating that they're ready to buy.

Our account manager relationship has been extremely helpful for our small team and through that relationship we have also been able to gain access to new features while they are still in beta mode. It has been great to partner with RS to test new innovations like more detailed segmentation and more personalized automation flows.

The help the RS team has provided in strategy has saved our small team countless hours as well.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent Customer Service, Real People
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Retention Science?
Retention Science has been a great partner to me because they not only listen and understand my business' needs, but they have also gone out of their way to keep my business during a time when balls were dropped.  Our brand is not big by any means (yet), and most agencies/services like ReSci would have said sorry and moved on, but Jerry and his team worked with me, and have been a part of our biggest year yet.  The customer support I receive from Mayra is fantastic, and the direct line I have to Jerry Jao makes me feel valued.    I feel like ReSci has my company's best interest in mind, and it makes the relationship collaborative, enjoyable, and most importantly profitable for both sides.

What do you dislike about Retention Science?
It hasn't been a perfect fit due to the size of my company, and ReSci's model and core value prop.  Because Retention Science is able to work its magic best with a larger company (larger customer base/emails to leverage the AI services, more consistent/healthier cash flow/inventory position).  There have been times, to no fault of Retention Science's, where we did not have enough inventory (read: no inventory) to generate any sales, let alone send out compelling emails.  As a very small, self-funded company, it has been challenging to meet demand and scale at the ideal rate.  During these out of stock times, it hurts to pay an enterprise-level fee to use ReSci's platform with a start-up-level wallet size.   The large majority of companies at our size would a service that has a lower monthly fee, and less hands-on service based on their budget, but we took a leap of faith joining ReSci because we knew what we could grow into, and their leadership so the same vision as us.  It's amazing that we're starting to grow to a size that allows ReSci's value prop and pricing make sense based on the revenues we bring in.

What problems is Retention Science solving and how is that benefiting you?
Retention Science is helping us accomplish our main objective of getting every single person who wants a pair a of Swoveralls...a pair of Swoveralls!  The email flows and audience insights up to this point have been incredibly helpful, but not necessarily differentiating from what a competitor service could provide.  What separates Retention Science apart from any other eCRM partner is the 1-on-1 customer support I receive from Mayra.  Mayra has an intimate understanding of ReSci and our business, and holds us accountable to implementing her actionable recommendations.  With her help, we are ultimately solving the problem of missed sales. Due to lack of communication on our end.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Retention Science solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Retention Science is helping us accomplish our main objective of getting every single person who wants a pair a of Swoveralls...a pair of Swoveralls!  The email flows and audience insights up to this point have been incredibly helpful, but not necessarily differentiating from what a competitor service could provide.  What separates Retention Science apart from any other eCRM partner is the 1-on-1 customer support I receive from Mayra.  Mayra has an intimate understanding of ReSci and our business, and holds us accountable to implementing her actionable recommendations.  With her help, we are ultimately solving the problem of missed sales. Due to lack of communication on our end.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Team Available for Hands-On Help
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Retention Science?
I used Retention Science's platform for 2 years as a supplemental tool to my company's ESP at the time. First off, I have to say they provided excellent client service and had the quickest response/turn around time out of any of the 3rd party marketing companies I've used.

Their tool was easy to implement and had a great User Interface. One of my favorite aspects about the tool was Offer Optimization. I was able to send larger discounts to customer's who were less likely to buy and send lower discounts to customers who were most likely to purchase. They were able to determine purchase likelihood through their tool and I could send multiple variations of an email in one swoop.

What do you dislike about Retention Science?
Overall, I have very few complaints about the tool. When I was using them I wanted some better data integration between them and my ESP, but that was very minimal.

Plus for any real complaints I had about the tool, Retention Science was quick to offer options and in multiple cases development new aspects into their tool at my request. Very few companies do this and the attention they provided my company helped us excel greatly.

Recommendations to others considering Retention Science:
The offer optimization feature was the most beneficial for me, so it's definitely worth considering when thinking about a return on investment. We were able to maximize our demand while protecting our profit margin by offering small discounts to likely purchasers and big discounts to unlikely purchasers.

Also consider the client assistance when comparing other companies. Retention Science was extremely helpful and quickly available when I came to them with emergency issues.

What problems is Retention Science solving and how is that benefiting you?
Retention Science allowed me to easily personalize email and target customers. I used all of the features below:

-One-to-One Marketing
-Offer Optimization Based on purchase likelihood
-Product Recommendation
-Send Time Optimization
-Triggered Emails
-On-site Targeting
-Customer + Demographic Segmentation
-Customer Retention Analytics
